text: Abswurmbachite is a black or dark brown metallic mineral. It is named after Irmgard Abs-Wurmbach, who is a German mineralogist. It is found in Mili, Avia or Andros Island, Greece. It is not radioactive.http://www.webmineral.com/data/Abswurmbachite.shtml Mineral Data Sheet == References == == Other websites == *Mindat.org *Webmineral.org Category:Nesosilicates
title: Abswurmbachite
